scripts.client: cd.. && cd client && npm run start:dev
scripts.newOrder: cd.. && cd new-order && npm run start:dev
scripts.newOrderListen: cd.. && cd new-order && npm run listen
scripts.senMessage: cd.. && cd send-message && npm run start:dev
scripts.senMessageListen: cd.. && cd send-message && npm run listen
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm start" "npm run client" "npm run newOrder" "npm run newOrderListen" "npm run senMessage" "npm run senMessageListen"
